title: Goodwood Revival 2025
description: The Goodwood Revival is the world's greatest historic motor race meeting and the only sporting event of its kind to be staged entirely in a period theme.
fullDescription:
## About Goodwood Revival

The Goodwood Revival celebrates the halcyon days of motor racing as it was in the 1940s, 1950s, and 1960s. It is the world's most celebrated historic motor racing event and the only event of its kind to be staged entirely in the nostalgic time capsule of the 1940s, 50s, and 60s.

The event is a magical step back in time to the romance and glamour of motor racing as it used to be. It is the world's most popular historic motor race meeting and the only sporting event of its kind to be staged entirely in the nostalgic time capsule of the 1940s, 50s, and 60s that relives the glory days of Goodwood Motor Circuit.

On the track, you'll see rare and priceless cars of the period racing wheel-to-wheel, while off-track the event is a celebration of fashion and music from the post-war decades.
